CustomField.description: This field is used to determine that a user gained BSP access via Merchant Portal signup by a customer admin. This is also used to determine the content to send to a new BSP user in the welcome email. Check this option will push the user to login via Merchant Portal rather than the standard BSP login page.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is used to determine that a user gained BSP access via Merchant Portal signup by a customer admin. This is also used to determine the content to send to a new BSP user in the welcome email.
CustomField.label: BSP Signup via Merchant Portal
